description:
A high-capacity rescue PFD for guides, trip leaders, and other advanced paddlers. The Centurion builds on Kokatat’s ground-breaking Prime PFD, adding a removable belly pouch for equipment-intensive situations. It has a low profile/high buoyancy design and mobile central panels to follow you through twisty moves. Both features will serve you well for creeking, river running, playboating or extreme touring.

  • Gaia foam is latex and PVC free. Outer shell is rugged Cordura®
  • Full spine and side coverage for protection
  • Side entry provides easy donning and secure wearing
  • Front and centre webbing straps allow complete adjustment
  • Contoured neoprene shoulder straps are wide for comfort
  • Dynamic Suspension System allows free movement of central panels
  • Removable belly pouch has 3 pockets to let you organize and quickly access your rescue tools
  • Front lash tab keeps your knife at hand
  • Anchor patch on back holds a strobe
  • Large zipper front pocket with gusset sizes to fit load
  • Quick-release chest harness and O-ring accept optional tether/tow systems
  • Stretch-mesh sleeve holds a cow tail
name: Kokatat Maximus Centurion PFD - Unisex
